data.lyric:
[ti:IMY2 (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Kid Cudi]
[al:Certified Lover Boy (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]IMY2 (Explicit) - Drake/Kid Cudi
[00:02.44]Lyrics by：A. Graham/S. Mescudi/H. Arsenault/C. Owuor/A. Benfaress/I. Bizimana/Dounia Aznou/K. Castañeda
[00:04.89]Composed by：A. Graham/S. Mescudi/H. Arsenault/C. Owuor/A. Benfaress/I. Bizimana/Dounia Aznou/K. Castañeda
[00:07.33]Juice WRLD：
[00:07.46]I think that's what life is about
[00:08.81]
[00:12.41]Truly findin' yourself
[00:13.36]
[00:17.07]And then closin' your eyes and dyin' in your sleep
[00:18.99]Kid Cudi/Drake：
[00:19.43]Lifted are my days my dreams are vivid colors
[00:21.65]Woo
[00:22.46]The jet is low they make me take your trips we fly by
[00:25.21]Let's go
[00:25.66]No stress is on my brain no worries here I'm chosen
[00:28.07]Yeah yeah
[00:28.87]Made another way my n***a watch me go shine
[00:31.95]When I close my eyes my world comes alive
[00:35.41]Yeah
[00:36.13]La-la-la-la-la-la
[00:38.87]People grow good times sometimes
[00:41.65]N***a
[00:42.22]Real n***as in life survive
[00:44.46]Yeah
[00:44.77]And I'm sailing to the edge of my mind
[00:48.45]N***a double up life
[00:50.66]Yeah yeah
[00:51.12]Set the tempo got a nympho on my line
[00:54.29]Yeah-yeah
[00:54.95]Said she wanna unwind
[00:57.49]She do
[00:57.98]
[00:59.07]And I'm focused on gettin' more
[01:00.86]
[01:02.12]They too stuck on gettin' even I'm ready for it
[01:05.24]We should really be together more
[01:07.23]
[01:08.48]'Cause I know we got some time but I'm never sure
[01:10.95]Kid Cudi：
[01:11.25]Catch me ten-toes in the limelight
[01:13.69]Yeah
[01:14.20]F**k the world up on my life right
[01:16.95]N***a
[01:17.33]Sayin' I'm the one she lie lie
[01:19.98]She checkin' for me now baby come in my dreams my dreams
[01:23.39]Yeah
[01:23.74]Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa
[01:26.49]
[01:27.00]Hey-ayy hey-ayy hey-yeah
[01:29.74]
[01:30.37]Whoa-whoa whoa-whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa
[01:35.60]
[01:36.26]Drake/Kid Cudi：
[01:36.85]
[01:37.76]Finding myself as the days
[01:41.02]Fly by like us on the move
[01:44.10]You told me I was a phase
[01:47.32]Okay fine I miss you too
[01:50.50]Probably wouldn't believe me if I told you
[01:53.91]Pieces of myself that I should never lose
[01:57.01]All these people that love you don't know you
[02:00.15]How am I supposed to move
[02:02.13]Hey-ayy hey-ayy hey-yeah
[02:04.79]
[02:06.67]How am I supposed to move
[02:08.18]Drake：
[02:08.31]
[02:09.84]All my n***as rally 'round me
[02:11.24]Bold n***as gettin' real italics 'round me
[02:13.76]Finally circled found the purple
[02:15.24]Undisclosed amounts straight from Universal
[02:17.69]Too commercial 'leven years later I done found my purpose
[02:20.88]
[02:22.05]Here I am oh they mad
[02:24.52]
[02:25.12]Goin' out swingin' for 'em goin' out sad
[02:27.43]Kid Cudi：
[02:27.81]Catch me ten-toes in the limelight
[02:30.47]Yeah
[02:31.01]F**k the world up on my life right
[02:33.67]N***a
[02:34.12]Sayin' I'm the one she lie lie
[02:36.81]She checkin' for me now baby come in my dreams my dreams
[02:40.12]Yeah
[02:40.59]Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa
[02:43.23]
[02:43.85]Hey-ayy hey-ayy hey-yeah
[02:46.41]
[02:47.30]Whoa-whoa whoa-whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa
[02:51.89]
[02:53.02]Drake：
[02:53.32]
[02:54.59]Finding myself as the days
[02:57.75]Fly by like us on the move
[03:00.93]You told me I was a phase
[03:04.09]Okay fine I miss you too
[03:07.32]Probably wouldn't believe me if I told you
[03:10.76]Pieces of myself that I should never lose
[03:13.80]All these people that love you don't know you
[03:16.92]How am I supposed to move
[03:18.63]
[03:21.08]Gettin' more
[03:21.71]
[03:26.28]We should really be together more
[03:28.03]
[03:30.81]But I'm never sure
